page.title: 07HEALTH Glan Clwyd Hospital
page.content: Ysbyty Glan Clwyd is Clwyd's newest and most up_to_date hospital it was opened in 1980 and it cost sixteen million pounds to build and costs 1 million pounds a month to run. The hospital is a very clean efficient place It has 360 female nurses and 22 male it has 47 ward sisters and 100 doctors. Visiting hours are from 3.30pm to 5.00pm and 7.00pm to 8.00pm. Visitors normally come by car. It's patients seem to die most commonly from cancer and heart related desices.The hospital has 20 kidney machines and 35 machines in patients homes.In 1984 16,212 patients were admitted.there are 6 major operating theatres and 1 minor one. starting pay for a nurse is Â£6,000 a ward sister Â£7,500 a doctor Â£9,500.
